name: Yet Another UploadBot
description: Build and Deploy your own UploadBot

EXAMPLE_WEB_DOMAIN.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

EXAMPLE_WEB_PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DOWNLOAD_LOCATION.description: the download location, where the HTTP Server runs

APP_ID.description: Get your own APP_ID from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get your own API_HASH from https://my.telegram.org

AUTHORIZED_USERS.description: comma seperated values of Telegram IDs obtained from https://telegram.dog/GetIDsBot

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages
